EmailTemplate.subject: AMGH Automates with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-AMGH-Success-Story.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At Air Medical Group Holdings, LLC, assuring application performance really is a life or death situation. Through workload automation with Turbonomic, AMGH provides all workloads the exact resources they need, at the right time, and always in accordance with policies.
<[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-AMGH-Success-Story.pdf]]> <[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-AMGH-Success-Story.pdf]]>
More than 1,900 organizations leverage Turbonomic to optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time. See who’s on board by industry <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]>.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
